menu.name: Spring Roll
menu.description: Crepe dough filled and fried with cabbage, carrots and sprouts with sweet chili sauce (3 units). A vegetarian dish

menu.name: Spring Roll Chicken
menu.description: Crepe dough filled and fried with chopped chicken filling, bean noodles, cabbage, carrots and sprouts with sweet chili sauce (3 units)

menu.name: Crispy Chicken Wings
menu.description: Chicken wings coated in a flour mixture of tempura and sweet chili sauce

menu.name: Aroi salad
menu.description: A choice of chicken / tofu saut√©ed on a find of curled lettuce, cherry tomatoes, bell pepper, carrots, purple onions, fried onions, green onions for garnish

menu.name: Aroi Omlet
menu.description: Thai omelet on a bed of white rice in prik nam pla sauce. A vegetarian dish

menu.name: Chicken in tempura
menu.description: Chicken balls coated in tempura flour fried with sweet chili sauce

menu.name: Tempura Combination
menu.description: Tempura chicken balls 20 pcs + chicken wings 8 pcs

menu.name: Spring Roll Combination
menu.description: Spring Roll (3 pcs) +  Chicken Spring Roll (3 pcs)

menu.name: Spring Roll & Tempura Combination
menu.description: Spring roll (2 pcs) + chicken spring roll (2 pcs) +  tempura chicken balls (10 pcs)+ chicken wings (4 pcs)

menu.name: Tom Yum soup
menu.description: Sour spicy soup with strips of chicken / tofu and coconut milk spiced with lemon grass, kaffir lime, galangal, shallot onions, fish sauce, chopped tamarind and chili. Served with added rice

menu.name: Aroi Beef Soup
menu.description: Beef soup with rice noodles, sprouts, cabbage, scallions, coriander and peanuts

menu.name: Tom Yum Plaa
menu.description: Sour spicy soup with strips of white fish and coconut milk spiced with lemon grass, kaffir lime, galangal, shallot onions, fish sauce, chopped tamarind and chili. Served with added rice

menu.name: Green Curry Noodles
menu.description: Green noodles with chicken strips, red and yellow peppers, coconut milk, Thai beans, Thai basil, eggplant, coriander and green curry

menu.name: Red Curry Noodles
menu.description:
Red noodles with strips of beef, coconut milk, eggplant cubes, pepper, purple onion and red curry

*served with beef*

menu.name: Gaeng Kiew Wan
menu.description: Chicken / beef / tofu in green curry sauce and coconut milk with eggplant cubes, Thai eggplant, bamboo shoot and Thai basil on a bed of white rice

menu.name: Chicken Curry
menu.description: Chicken / beef / tofu in red curry sauce and coconut milk with eggplant cubes, bamboo shoot red pepper and basil on a bed of white rice

menu.name: Thai Panang Curry
menu.description: Chicken / tofu / beef in a Thai curry panang sauce with a creamy texture and milk and coconut with diced eggplant, bamboo shoot, red pepper and basil on a bed of white rice

menu.name: Pad Thai
menu.description: Stir-fried chicken / tofu with rice noodles and egg in a pad thai sauce (sweet) with added coriander, cabbage, carrots, peanuts, lemon, scallions, sprouts

menu.name: Pad see ew
menu.description: Stir-fried chicken / beef / tofu with wide rice noodles and egg, cauliflower, broccoli, bak choy and lemon in a dark soy sauce served with lemon, Peanuts and corinader

menu.name: Fried rice
menu.description: Chicken / beef / tofu with stir-fried rice with egg, carrots, cabbage, cherry tomatoes, mushrooms in soy sauce and teriyaki. Served with lemon and corinader

menu.name: Pad Ka Pao
menu.description: Chopped chicken / beef with basil, pepper, onion, and fresh chilli in garlic and soy sauce with white rice end egg yolk

menu.name: Aroi Noodles
menu.description: Chicken / beef / tofu with egg noodles, egg, onions, scallions, pepper, mushrooms, sprouts, cabbage and carrots in a sweet and spicy sauce

menu.name: Udon Noodles
menu.description: Chicken / entrecote / tofu with fresh thick noodles saut√©ed with egg, onion, scallion, gamba, mushrooms, sprouts, cabbage and carrots in a sweet and spicy sauce

menu.name: Pad Pak
menu.description: Stir-fried beef / chicken / tofu with cauliflower broccoli, bok choy, cabbage and mushrooms in a smoky and sweet sauce on a bed of steamed rice

menu.name: Chicken in Cashews
menu.description: Fried chicken with tempura coating with cashews and gamba onions in a sweet and sour sauce on a bed of steamed rice

menu.name: Chaza
menu.description: Crispy eggplants saut√©ed with chicken / tofu / beef in a semi-sweet sauce with green onions and chili. Served with rice

menu.name: Red Curry Coconut Noodles
menu.description: Stir-fried chicken / tofu / beef with egg noodles, bell pepper, purple onion, carrot and green onion in a red curry sauce, basil and coconut milk.

menu.name: Green Coconut Curry Noodles
menu.description: Stir-fried chicken / tofu / beef with egg noodles, bell pepper, red onion, carrot and scallions in a green curry sauce, basil, coriander, kfir leaves and coconut milk

menu.name: Kids Noodles With Chicken and Vegetables
menu.description: Egg Noodles, chicken, cabbage and carrot stir-fried in a sweet sauce

menu.name: Kids Noodles
menu.description: Egg Noodles stir-fried in sweet sauce

menu.name: Kids Noodles With Chicken
menu.description: Egg Noodles and chicken stir-fried in a sweet sauce
